verses.roman:
aṁśera aṁśa yei, 'kalā' tāra nāma
govindera pratimūrti śrī-balarāma

synonyms: aṁśera—of the part; aṁśa—part; yei—that which; kalā—a kalā, or part of the plenary portion; tāra—its; nāma—name; govindera—of Lord Govinda; prati-mūrti—counterform; śrī-balarāma—Lord Balarāma.
translation: A part of a part of a whole is called a kalā. Śrī Balarāma is the counterform of Lord Govinda.
